3DR Tower

Back to main menue.

Tower is an open source flight control app running on android/linux platforms with a its github contributor repository. Here an overview of its features.

3DR Tower has all functionality for defining a mapping survey flights:

  1. Perimeter area definition;
  2. Image overlap requirements;
  3. Flight speed;
  4. Altitude and derived image resolution /flight time lenght;
  5. Flight mission compilation to the IRIS.

This video tutorial show how to set up a survey mission on Tower. Tower is handy for using a tablet on field studies.

Read Tower best practices before flying UAV missions.

Tower can also be used for other tasks such as 3D modelling a site location.
